document_data.mainbody:
rnolius was an armorsmith and merchant who lived in Athkatla during the mid–14 century DR.
He spoke in broken Common and had the peculiar affectation of referring to himself in the third person. He was proud of the name "Arnolius" – a fine dwarven name.
Arnolius operated his smithy in the Waukeens Promenade marketplace in the Center District of Athkatla, sharing the workshop with a renown fletcher named Perter. He offered a great variety of enchanted shields painted in a variety of different colors.
